__TOC__


== LoCo ==

=== Admins ===

In charge of managing all memberships and roles of the LoCo Team. Normally has inherent admin status everything else.

=== Assistants ===

In charge of helping the LoCo Admins in any way they request. This role is reserved for those going above and beyond other roles or involved in unlisted roles. These members have gained significant trust with the LoCo Admins.

=== Official_Contact ===

The official contact is the person who listens to Canonical or Ubuntu communities. They will report and communicate any relevant information between the channels they are relevant to.

=== Leaders ===

Leaders have been recognized as individuals that have been recognized with significant contributions. To be a leaderm you have to lead, show conviction, integrity and provide the structure by which everyone else can grow.

=== Treasury ===

In charge of handling all monetary exchanges within the SD LoCo. This requires a PayPal account. More information on <nowiki>[[ SouthDakotaTeam-Treasury ]]</nowiki>.

=== Warehouse ===

In charge of handling all products shipped to and from the LoCo. More information on <nowiki>[[ SouthDakotaTeam-Warehouse ]]</nowiki>.
